title: How to Make a Strawberry Surprise

steps.headline: Take two or three scoops of strawberry ice cream and place them into the blender.
Let mix.
steps.description: When finished mixing, you should have a standard milkshake.

steps.headline: Take out a cup (the one you want to use for your finished drink).
steps.description: Do not dump the entire milkshake in the cup. Only pour a little bit in.

steps.headline: Take out your container of strawberry yogurt.
steps.description: Pour a little of its contents on top of the milkshake you just put it, as if it's another layer.

steps.headline: Gently trickle on some strawberry syrup.
Repeat the pouring process until your cup is full.
Put whipped cream and rainbow sprinkles at the tip.
Top it off with a strawberry, stick in a straw, and sip!

text: Take two or three scoops of strawberry ice cream and place them into the blender.  Pour in some milk.  Let mix. When finished mixing, you should have a standard milkshake. Take out a cup (the one you want to use for your finished drink). Do not dump the entire milkshake in the cup. Only pour a little bit in. Take out your container of strawberry yogurt. Pour a little of its contents on top of the milkshake you just put it, as if it's another layer. Gently trickle on some strawberry syrup.  Repeat the pouring process until your cup is full.  Put whipped cream and rainbow sprinkles at the tip.  Top it off with a strawberry, stick in a straw, and sip!
